meanings.definition: The quality or state of being runny.
meanings.sent1: The runniness of the melted ice cream made it easy to pour.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the runniness of a soft-boiled egg over a hard-boiled one.
meanings.sent3: The runniness of the paint made it look like a colorful waterfall on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her tears flowed with the runniness of a river after hearing the sad news.
meanings.sent5: The runniness of the sauce added a delicious touch to the pasta dish.

meanings.definition: The tendency to flow or drip easily.
meanings.sent1: The runniness of the honey made it perfect for drizzling over pancakes.
meanings.sent2: The runniness of the leaky faucet was causing a puddle to form on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The runniness of the melted ice cream created a sticky mess on the table.
meanings.sent4: The runniness of the candle wax made it drip down the side of the candle.
meanings.sent5: The runniness of the sauce made it slide off the plate onto the table.
